department: Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering, NSRIT Nadimpalli Satyanarayana Raju Institute of Technology, Visakhapatnam
description: A 24-hour National Level Hackathon focusing on innovation across various themes like Industry 4.0, Agriculture, Healthcare, and more.
target_audience: National Level (implied for students and developers)
additional_info: Organized by E-CUBE and the Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering. In association with Ecomedusys Pvt Ltd. NSRIT is an Autonomous, NBA Tier 1 Accredited institute. Registration via QR code. Instagram handle: e.cube.official.
raw_text: NSRIT NADIMPALLI SATYANARAYANA RAJU INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY AUTONOMOUS VISAKHAPATNAM NBA NATIONAL BOARD OF ACCREDITATION TIER 1 ACCREDITED DEPARTMENT OF ELECTRONICS AND COMMUNICATION ENGINEERING IN ASSOCIATION WITH ECOMEDUSYS PVT LTD E-CUBE PRESENTS INNO YUDH 24 HOURS NATIONAL LEVEL HACKATHON DATE: 12th - 13th DECEMBER 2025 ABSTRACT SUBMISSION: 23rd NOVEMBER 2025 THEMES: INDUSTRY 4.0 AGRICULTURE HEALTH CARE APP DEVELOPMENT IOT AI & ML BLOCK CHAIN APP DEVELOPMENT STUDENT INNOVATION PRIZE POOL 50K+ REGISTER NOW For more info please contact: FACULTY CO-ORDINATOR Dr Konari Rajasekhar +91 90106 63282 e.cube.official innoyudh.info@gmail.com
